div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 06:55 am CDT

td.span: A 40 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 66. South wind 5 to 10 mph becoming northeast in the afternoon.

A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms, mainly before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly clear, with a low around 47. Northeast wind 5 to 10 mph becoming west after midnight.
Sunny, with a high near 76. Northwest wind around 5 mph becoming southwest in the afternoon.
